Actions.Name: Yew Bow
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage for every character adjacent to the target.

Actions.Name: Enthrall
Actions.Description: The Nymph chooses a foe in range 8. That foe must save. On a successful save, they are vulnerable. On a failed save, they are vulnerable and Nymph controls their standard movement on their next turn. Already vulnerable characters fail the save.

Actions.Name: Riven
Actions.Description: The Nymph chooses a character in range 8. At the end of that character's turn, they take [D] piercing damage once for every 3 spaces of distance between them and the Nymph. Then, end this effect.

Actions.Name: Greenpath
Actions.Description: Remove the Nymph from play, then place them anywhere on the battlefield in free space. Clear all statuses from them.
